main.name: Pradeepa Kathiresan
main.description: Leading Software Developer and Engineer with 8 years of work experience leading developing teams in different settings (including client location). I enjoy coding, testing, and integration. Seeking anew challenges and opportunities to leverage. I am an experienced Certified Safe Agile Practitioner, having successfully worked with service-oriented (SOA) architectures and web services. Holds a BE in CS with many recent study certifications.
main.bio: Hi! I'm Pradeepa.  I am always looking for something that scare or interests me to learn. I had created so many CV's of mine, finally ended up with a plan to create a portfolio website with any of the trending technologies. I have a list of ‘Wish-To-Do’ things in various new technologies. I like to use or feel most comfortable with Front End technologies. I inspire myself for my hardwork, and all my co-workers for their unique qualities.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience in various technologies including, Front-end, Middleware and Backend

education.description: I had done my masters in distance, It was quite challenging for me, I aquired management skills which helped me communicate in a more efficient way.
I was studious, secured 81%, skills learned helped me in my career.

work.title: Senior Analyst
work.description: I got opportunity to work in various new technology including API and Adapter developments. Learning with Mandatory trainings are vast here.

work.title: Technology Analyst
work.description: I had an opportunity to scale up myself and identify my area of strength and interests. Learning is vast @Infosys.

testimonials.text: People say to me that I am friendly in nature and understanding. Few of the Projects I had worked with gave me encouraging feedback for my work especially in front-end
will be one of the inspiring personality!
